subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tigers slugger Miguel Cabrera, who’s been nursing an abdominal injury and took two foul balls off his leg Friday, has hit two homers and driven in four runs in his past two games.
snippet: Tigers slugger Miguel Cabrera, who’s been nursing an abdominal injury and took two foul balls off his leg Friday, has hit two homers and driven in four runs in his past two games.
